description: Upon execution [Spica](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1140) can decode an embedded .pdf and write it to the desktop as a decoy document.(Citation: Google TAG COLDRIVER January 2024)

external_references.description: Shields, W. (2024, January 18). Russian threat group COLDRIVER expands its targeting of Western officials to include the use of malware. Retrieved June 13, 2024.
